definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: On the top of the gallows is fixed the knife, blade upwards, with its point in the air.
sentences.chinese: 絞架頂上捆着他那把刀，刀口向上，刀尖在空中。

sentences.english: He was saved from the gallows by a lastminute reprieve.
sentences.chinese: 最後一刻的緩刑令把他從絞架上解救了下來。
